game.name: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode
game.shortDescription: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode is a psychological horror game. Manipulate time and gravity to solve puzzles in ever-changing, twisted spaces. With only a VHS camcorder, uncover dark secrets, face unseen anomalies, and navigate an uncharted dimension where reality unravels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode is a psychological horror game. Manipulate time and gravity to solve puzzles in ever-changing, twisted spaces. With only a VHS camcorder, uncover dark secrets, face unseen anomalies, and navigate an uncharted dimension where reality unravels.
